author: cms-sw
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#37092
It restores PR #37079, merged by me by mistake.
@srimanob FYI

**PR description:**
This PR is to add D88 ttbar dd4hep workflow (39434.911) to relval_2026.

**PR validation:**
Local test with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37078 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37005, the workflow run fine.

**if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:**
Not a backport and no need of backport.
title: Revert "Revert "Add D88 DD4hep wf to relval_2026""
